column5: Hi I have an lcd tv with 4 black lines running vertically on the screen. Im trying to figure out if there is a way to minimize these lines. There is one really dark one that if it was gone would make a world of difference. Ive looked on google and found out that the older tube models were able to be degaussed but with lcd this is not the case.  Thanks Jason

I did a quick google, "black lines on LCD TV",  seems samsung is the worst by the amount of compalints but other brands are also susceptable.  It appears bad connections to the screen seems to be the major fault.
